projects.title: Abba Malkaa
projects.description: Abbaa Malkaa is a landmark 2025 Afaan Oromoo family drama film directed by Lencho Fikru that explores social stigma and cultural identity in 1970s Ethiopia
projects.fullDescription: Abbaa Malkaa is a groundbreaking 2025 Oromo-language film directed by Lencho Fikru, rooted in the story of Jimma Galataa, a blacksmith confronting societal marginalization under Ethiopia’s stratified social norms of the 1970s. It combines deep cultural themes with rich storytelling and strong performances by locally trained actors, many from the Abbaa Lataa Acting Academy.  The film’s historic premiere at the Ethiopian National Theatre signifies a major milestone for Afaan Oromoo cinema and its increasing visibility on the national stage. Abbaa Malkaa has been praised for its authentic portrayal of Oromo culture and its contribution to expanding the Ethiopian film landscape.

projects.title: Darammasi
projects.description: Darammasi” is a 2023 Oromo-language Ethiopian song performed by Helen Berhe, blending contemporary Ethiopian pop with Oromo musical expression and released through Hope Music Ethiopia’s platform
projects.fullDescription: Darammasi” is a popular 2023 single by Ethiopian singer Helen Berhe, released on YouTube by the record label Hope Music Ethiopia. The song entered Ethiopian music charts, reaching a Top 10 position and appearing multiple times in weekly and daily rankings. Its music video was officially published on 30 May 2023 and has accumulated hundreds of thousands of views across platforms. The release marked one of Berhe’s notable Afaan Oromoo songs, expanding her repertoire beyond Amharic hits.

projects.title: Iyyoolee
projects.description: Iyyoolee” is a vibrant 2024 Oromo-language music single by Ethiopian artist Gutu Abera that blends traditional rhythms with contemporary pop elements, celebrated for its energetic music video and wide regional popularity.
projects.fullDescription: Iyyoolee” is a 2024 Oromo song performed by Gutu Abera, known for its lively beat and engaging visuals that highlight cultural dance and community themes. Musically, the song blends melodic vocals with rich instrumentation contributed by musicians such as Mira Thiruchelvam and others. Since its release, “Iyyoolee” has been featured across streaming platforms and enjoyed by audiences for its cultural resonance and energetic performance style.

projects.title: Afran
projects.description: An affan oromoo sitcom series that humorously explores the daily lives and challenges of a modern Oromo family living in Addis Ababa, blending cultural traditions with contemporary urban experiences.
projects.fullDescription: 'Afran' is a groundbreaking Afaan Oromoo sitcom series that delves into the humorous and heartfelt experiences of an Oromo family navigating life in Addis Ababa. The show skillfully combines traditional Oromo cultural elements with the realities of modern urban living, offering viewers relatable storylines filled with comedy and warmth. Through its engaging characters and witty dialogue, 'Afran' highlights themes of family, community, and identity, making it a beloved addition to Ethiopian television.
